mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, name, email,phone_number, hire_date , leave_date , department_id , reg_no FROM (SELECT employee_id, name, email, phone_number, hire_date , leave_date , department_id , reg_no, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY employee_id DESC) AS RNUM FROM employees) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) FROM employees WHERE employee_id > 0
SELECT employee_id, name, email,phone_number, hire_date , address , leave_date , department_id , reg_no FROM employees where employee_id = #{employee_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees ( employee_id , name , email , department_id , phone_number , hire_date , leave_date , address , reg_no , bank_id , bank_account ) VALUES( EMPLOYEES_SEQ.nextval , #{name} , #{email} , #{department_id} , #{phone_number} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{address} , #{reg_no} , #{bank_id} , #{bank_account} )
mapper.update: UPDATE employees a SET name = #{name}, email = #{email} , phone_number = #{phone_number}, leave_date = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') , department_id = #{department_id} , reg_no = #{reg_no}, bank_id = #{bank_id}, bank_account = #{bank_account} where a.employee_id = #{employee_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM employees a WHERE a.employee_id = #{employee_id}
